entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Vanderhoof
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.7°C

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
